itemGroup.relativedimensions: Property of the Advanced Intelligence & Development group
item.relativedimensions.avidsdpt: AVID short distance particle matter transmitter
item.relativedimensions.avidsdpt.tooltip: Click on a nearby block to be teleported to it instantly!
item.relativedimensions.transmatbeamemit: Error on transmat transmission: Teleportation failed.
Click to teleport to an on-sight block after a short charging time.
item.relativedimensions.trackercompass.t: Use the item to track a player! If there are no players in range, the compass will not activate.
item.relativedimensions.teamtrackercompa: Use the item to track a player of your team! If there are no players in range, the compass will not acivate.
item.relativedimensions.trackers.compass: Compass already armed and locked on to a player
item.relativedimensions.trackers.player_: Due to target proximity, the compass has overloaded and no longer works. The excess energy vaporized the compass before your eyes
block.relativedimensions.tsrail: Rail piece part of the AVID center transit system
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_pickaxe: A pickaxe powered by radiation from outer dimensions:

MINING ABERRANTISM CURSE:
Low chance of corrupting any block mined, specially ores, into aberrant blocks

DIMENSIONAL SHIFTING:
Low chance of switching the block mined, specially ores, with a random one from another dimension
It phases in and out of reality after having absorbed too much atron energy and, thus, unstable. You don't know if you should touch it
block.relativedimensions.aberrant_ore.to: Once a normal mineral, this ore seems to be a an error. As if it came from another place.
A shard that holds properties beyond your comprehension. It warp reality around it
block.relativedimensions.aberrant_minera: A cluster of rocks and minerals of the sorrounding area, compressed by dimensional distorsion. It gives off faint heat
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_ingot.t: A mineral ingot that seems to emanate dimensional energy. It could be used as a source of energy. Or as a weapon. Or...
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_sword.t: A sword powered by the no-energy of the void between dimensions.

SLASHING ABERRANTISM CURSE

VOID RADIATION EMISSION

SLASHING ABERRANTISM CURSE:
Low chance of teleporting any entity it hits in a random block-free direction in a short radius

VOID RADIATION EMISSION:
Low chance of irradiating its wielder with exotic void radiation, causing one random negative effect and a random small amount of damage (Between 1.5 and 5 hearts).
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_axe.too: An axe made partly by matter from another dimension.

WOODCUTTING ABERRANTISM CURSE

DIMENSIONAL BREACHING

EXTRA-DIMENSIONAL PARTICLE EMISSION

WOODCUTTING ABERRANTISM:
Low chance of corrupting any structure sorrounding a wood-based block mined into its abrrent counterparts

DIMENSIONAL BREACHING:
If mining a wood-related block, low chance of switching it with a random item from another dimension. If hitting an entity, low chance of teleporting it to a free block in a random direction in a small radius.

EXTRA-DIMENSIONAL PARTICLE EMISSION:
Low chance of emitting particles from another dimension, causing a random effect to the player and a small amount of damage (Between 1.5 and 5 hearts) when hitting entities or mining blocks.
block.relativedimensions.aberrant_log.to: A log that hums when you touch it. It looks devoid of life, but it's not dead
Suspended particles seem to be trapped in the leaves. They are not from this world
Not unlike different realities, the planks are made from layered wood of those strange logs
block.relativedimensions.aberrant_wood.t: Even when cut down, another reality will take the place of this one. It's a neverending cycle
block.relativedimensions.stripped_aberra: Layer after layer, the wood is still resilient.
Layer after layer, the wood is still resilient.
block.relativedimensions.aberrant_saplin: This sapling is the perfect representation of the potentiality of life. So many branches, so many leaves, so many possibilities
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_stick_t: Stick made from wood with strange properties. It is the only kind of wood that can hold the energy of aberrant minerals without deteriorating
A shovel that can dig through the fabric of reality itself.
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_grass.t: Dirt with grass that was altered due to dimensional spillages.
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_dirt.to: Dirt that was altered due to dimensional spillages.
item.relativedimensions.aberrant_snowy_g: Dirt with snow on top. Instead of melting, the snow seems to be absorbed by the dirt due to the radiation inside the block.
advancements.relativedimensions.aberrant: You just found something that shouldn't be there
advancements.relativedimensions.teleport: When live gives you lemmons, teleport them away
cmds.modpvp.error.levelnotvalid: Error: Level not valid. Valid levels are: -1 (no pvp), 0 (pvp), 1 (ultra pvp)
cmds.modpvp.error.highestlevel: Error: PVP level already set to highest value
cmds.modpvp.error.lowestlevel: Error: PVP level already set to lowest value
cmds.timerpvp.publictimerenabled: [S.P.A.S] - Playtime started. Let's get exploring! (And be careful where you step on)
cmds.timerpvp.error.timeargumenttoosmall: Argument error. At least one minute of pvp time must be set
cmds.timerpvp.error.timeargumenttoobig: Argument error. 99 hours is the maximum amount of pvp time allowed
system.announcer.playerdeath.id: %s adventure has come to an end
system.disconnectmsg.exceededplaytime: You have exceeded your daily playtime limit. Come back tomorrow!
system.disconnectmsg.playerdeath: You have died! Thanks for playing!
system.worldborder.outofbounds: "Tou are out of bounds! Teleproting you back to play area in %s seconds...
system.worldborder.tpback: Teleporting you back to play area...
